Description:
Prized pocket offers quality family lifestyle.
Located in what is arguably one of the most sought after addresses in Croydon Hills, this spacious four bedroom home enjoys immediate access to Candlebark Walk Reserve, in addition to The Good Shepherd Primary School, Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and McAdam's Square Shopping Centre.
Beyond the delightful garden and brick veneer façade, this well-presented residence offers everyday comfort and convenience. Sweeping across this well planned, single-level layout, one lucky family is promised a quality lifestyle.
Multiple living zones provide the family with the opportunity to relax together or spend time apart. Beginning with the carpeted lounge and dining on the left as you enter the home, the optimal layout places the open-plan family and meals area at the centre of the home, with easy access to the covered outdoor entertaining area that overlooks the secure backyard.
The timber kitchen makes meal preparation a breeze. Perfectly positioned between the formal and casual living areas, the kitchen features an electric wall oven, stainless steel gas stove, Miele dishwasher and abundant storage cupboards.
The master bedroom comprises a walk-in robe and modernised ensuite with shower, stylish vanity and toilet. There are three additional bedrooms, two of which are robed and zoned together off a private hallway along with the main bathroom which features a bath, shower and separate toilet.
The spacious laundry is tiled and fitted with cupboards, furthermore, other superb inclusions are summarised as; gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, beautiful bay window (lounge), double linen closet, water tank, shed, remote double car accommodation in addition to ample off-street parking.
This property is well located just a short walk from Kurboroo Kindergarten, Yarrunga Reserve with BMX track, tennis court and playground, as well as momentary access to Croydon Railway Station and EastLink freeway for easy access to the CBD.
This impressive home is geared towards a family who live a busy lifestyle.
